title: Learning Ballet (gnv64)
description:
Learning Ballet
by Kathrin Barth and Sigrid Romer
Meyer & Meyer Sport | September 2007 | ISBN-10: 1841262242 | 152 Pages | PDF | 23 mb

Has your child ever shown an interest in wanting to learn to dance? This comprehensive and easy-to-understand volume is the perfect guide to the basics of ballet for children. "Learning Ballet" is packed with advice, inspiration, and motivation for little ones to learn the essential positions and movements at their own pace, as well as a number of easy exercises that can be done at home. Also included in this superb volume are a number of colourful worksheets that allow children to really see the progress they have made, as well as advice on proper clothing, nutrition, and healthy living. This is a must-have volume for anyone who wants to put a smile on their child's face.

About the Author
Kathrin Barth is a qualified teacher with many years of professional experience. Sigrid Romer is a certified dance instructor and director of the dance department at the Johan Sebastian Music School in Leipzig, Germany.
